item.title: Golshifteh Farahani to Receive Excellence Award Davide Campari at Locarno: ‘Charismatic and Multifaceted’
item.description: Golshifteh Farahani will receive the Locarno Film Festival’s prestigious Excellence Award Davide Campari on Aug. 6, 2025. Farahani will present her recent film, Julia Ducournau’s “Alpha,” which premie
